name: Can Spiders Jump?
description:
A game made for the Weekly Game Jam 165. Theme: 1-button-mash

You are a little jumping spider that is good at jumping but not so good at sticking! Use your jumping ability to jump from wall to wall to avoid obstacles and reach the top. Use sliding to your advantage to position  and time your jumps!

You only need 1 button to play, SpacBar to jump. Have fun, any feedback is welcome
